body:
On MCZone, I bought 3 kits for Nexus (Scout,Pyro,Tank). Didn't funkystudious post that you will get xp if you donated for kits in MCZone? I wasn't being mean.

Please help- Tigor101

title: Don't I get xp?

replies.body: Same here. It wont work :( i bought 5 kits.

replies.body:
I think he has to manually give it since /redeem isn't working.
You can probably email support for experience :D
